snippet.title: A tales of Pirates: a Dummy Mutiny trailer
snippet.description:
A Tale of Pirates: A Dummy Mutiny – first videogame by Cranio Digital - is a first-person shooter with an arcade taste, designed and developed for Virtual
Reality.
The player will wear the hi-tech VR eyepatch of a brave Cra, called to face the mutiny of his
own crew - made up of unlikely dummies - in the most surreal uprising in the history of Caribbeans.

Available on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/852570/A_Tale_of_Pirates_a_Dummy_Mutiny/

CranioDigital
http://craniointernational.com/products/a-tale-of-pirates-dummy-mutiny/
